name: MaFl_Ryupang
oralText: Soldiers! Raise the blue flag of Jung Hwa! We exist for the people! We fight for the people!
introText: The dark will be weakened wherever they step, and then new light shall shine!
byeText: Faith and trust will always lead us.

links.title: Who are you?
texts: My name is Ryupang Silog I am Managing the House of Offerep and I lead the Blue Flag of Jung Hwa soldiers

links.title: Goodbye!
texts: Faith and trust will always lead us.
